00036 enum EReadTextFile
00037 {
00039     txtReadAll = 0, 
00041     txtIgnoreEmptyLines = 1,
00043     txtIgnoreComments = 2,
00045     txtStripWhitespace = 4,
00046 
00048     txtReadDefault = txtIgnoreEmptyLines | txtIgnoreComments | txtStripWhitespace
00049 };
00050 
00051 
00064 class CTextFile
00065 {
00066 public:
00067     // Open modes. Note that these are mutually exclusive!
00068     enum EOpenMode {
00070         read,
00072         write
00073     };
00074 
00075     /* Constructor. */
00076     CTextFile();
00078     ~CTextFile();
00079 
00081     //\{
00082     bool Open(const wxString& path, EOpenMode mode);
00083     bool Open(const CPath& path, EOpenMode mode);
00084     //\}
00085 
00087     bool        IsOpened() const;
00089     bool        Eof() const;
00091     bool        Close();
00092 
00093 
00104     wxString    GetNextLine(EReadTextFile flags = txtReadAll, const wxMBConv& conv = wxConvLibc, bool* result = NULL);
00105 
00111     bool        WriteLine(const wxString& line, const wxMBConv& conv = wxConvLibc);
00112 
00113 
00115     wxArrayString ReadLines(EReadTextFile flags = txtReadDefault, const wxMBConv& conv = wxConvLibc);
00116 
00118     bool WriteLines(const wxArrayString& lines, const wxMBConv& conv = wxConvLibc);
00119 
00120 private:
00122     wxFFile     m_file;
00124     EOpenMode   m_mode;
00125 };
